snippet: Eric E. Schmidt was a bit of a traveling salesman at the Allen & Co. media and tech mogul conference in Sun Valley, Idaho. Mr. Schmidt, the executive chairman of Google, began a fireside chat with a brief show-and-tell of Google products.
